Subject: Re: [gladiator] Extreme defeated

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"; format=flowed
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...>


>I kept getting an error message about Weapon 44 when running my
>scenario.  Can anybody from FSGames tell me what that error message
>concerns?  I want the scenario to run without error messages.

Hmm .. in general, that means you have object acting illegally once the 
scenario starts .. that is, you put down something weird in the scenario 
editor (like a thrown weapon) .. during game-play, the weapon or whatever 
gets confused ("who threw me?" "do I have a target?" "how long do I live 
for before vanishing?" etc.) and starts spewing error messages.

Are you sure the value you get is 44? I can't find anything specific to 
match up against that .. in general, the numeric codes for the weapons are:

         FAMILY_KNIFE 0
         FAMILY_ROCK 1
         FAMILY_ARROW 2
         FAMILY_FIREBALL 3
         FAMILY_TREE 4
         FAMILY_METEOR 5
         FAMILY_SPRINKLE 6
         FAMILY_BONE 7
         FAMILY_BLOOD 8
         FAMILY_BLOB 9
         FAMILY_FIRE_ARROW 10
         FAMILY_LIGHTNING 11
         FAMILY_GLOW 12
         FAMILY_WAVE 13
         FAMILY_WAVE2 14
         FAMILY_WAVE3 15
         FAMILY_CIRCLE_PROTECTION 16
         FAMILY_HAMMER 17
         FAMILY_DOOR 18
         FAMILY_BOULDER 19

--Tom
